Content: *p70969ra02228*22  17 ultraviolet light is incident on a zinc plate. if the photon energy is greater than the work function of the zinc, electrons are released.(a) state what is meant by work function.(1)(b)the ultraviolet (uv) section of the electromagnetic spectrum can be split into three parts, known as uva, uvb and uvc. the range of wavelengths of these parts is given in the table.uvcuvbuvarange of wavelength / nm200280280320320400the minimum de broglie wavelength of the released electrons is 1.50  109m.deduce whether the ultraviolet light incident upon the zinc plate is uva, uvb oruvc.work function of zinc = 4.30ev(6)
